Nālikera：An island，with many attendant islands．

When the country of King Bharu was destroyed because he took bribes，those who had blamed him for his unrighteousness were saved and found shelter in the islands round Nālikera．

See the Bharu Jātaka．J．ii．173．

nālikera：နာလိကေရ （ပ）
အုန်းပင်။Cocosnucifera
